Wait the total code:

program main

implicit none

integer(8) :: n, min_val, temp, i

! Read N

read(*,*) n

! Read first of 5 numbers and set as min_val

read(*,*) temp

min_val = temp

! Read the remaining four

do i=1,4

   read(*,*) temp

   if (temp < min_val) then

      min_val = temp

   end if

end do

! Compute ans.

integer(8) ans

ans = (n + min_val -1)/min_val +4

print *, ans

end program main
